info.headline: Freeze Watch issued January 08 at 3:13AM PST until January 09 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...FROST ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM PST THIS MORNING... ...FREEZE WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT THROUGH TUESDAY MORNING... ...WIND ADVISORY HAS EXPIRED... * WHAT...For the Frost Advisory, low temperatures of 33 to 35 degrees are expected, resulting in frost formation. For the Freeze Watch, low temperatures of 29 to 31 degrees are possible. * WHERE...Santa Clarita Valley. * WHEN...For the Frost Advisory, until 9 AM PST this morning. For the Freeze Watch, from late tonight through Tuesday morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions could kill or damage crops and other sensitive vegetation.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. Plan for extra time to defrost vehicle windshields.
